title: Economic Analysis, Discussion & Observation on Algo Stable Coins | DeFi Markets
description:
In our recent research on algo stablecoins, we found some imperfections in some of their mechanisms – namely economic misalignment and failure of coupons. In this episode, we analyze and discuss the impact of such failures.

-
